pageContext.claim: “Virtually everything failed lawyer Michael Cohen said in his sworn testimony last week is totally contradicted in his just released manuscript for a book about me. It’s a total new love letter to 'Trump' and the pols must now use it rather than his lies for sentence reduction!”
pageContext.analysis: Cohen never wrote a manuscript, according to his spokesman. In early 2018, Cohen shopped a book proposal that was pitched as a positive account of Trump, but he apparently did not write anything. Cohen’s spokesman, Lanny Davis, said that Cohen was offered a “substantial advance” nearly a year ago “for a proposal regarding a book on understanding Donald Trump. Mr. Cohen ultimately elected not to proceed.”
